title: Pierced
description: Imagine the Girl with the Dragon Tattoo meets Betty Crocker. That's Pierce in a nutshell.Pierce has been on the run for two years from the man who held her captive in a vampire compound for almost a decade. Life on the run would be a lot simpler if she didn't suffer from several social disorders and 'quirks', have a ten-year-old brat in tow, as well as have two characters from a 1945 classic film living in her head and guiding her at every turn.Updated Pierced Series Reading order:Book 1 - PIERCEDBook 2- ESCAPED (novella formerly listed as Book 1.5)Book 3 - PINKEDBook 4 - PERFECTBook 5 - NAPOLEON (stand alone novella)
author: J.C. Mells
